issue.title: [FCD] function does not need an explicit default constructor

discussion.p: explicit default contructor is defined in std::function. Although it is allowed according to 12.3.1, it seems unnecessary to qualify the constructor as explicit. If it is explicit, there will be a limitation in initializer_list.
discussion.note: Resolved in Rapperswil by a motion to directly apply the words from the ballot comment in N3102.
